Instruction: In a medium bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 cup of sugar, and melted butter until well combined.
Press the crumb mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan to form the crust.
In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese and 1 and 1/4 cups of sugar until smooth.
Add the sour cream and vanilla extract, mixing until combined.
Add the eggs one at a time, beating on low speed after each addition just until blended.

Pour the cream cheese mixture over the crust in the springform pan.
